text: Rod Brind'Amour confirms that Antti Raanta will start tonight for the #Canes as they host the Panthers. The veteran has won his last five decisions including a 24-save shutout of Chicago on Tuesday.
Knight had a 40-save shutout in his last start against Carolina on Nov. 9. Knight vs. Raanta tonight. https://t.co/vhKbCBXllb
